name: Dark Vault
description:
DARK VAULT

Welcome to the Dark Vault. This game will be our groups' first entry in any Game Jame and we are proud to say that this will definitely not be our last. This game is about how you must conquer your own demons again and again until you successfully defeat them all and finally stop the cycle of life and death in the dungeon.

CONTROLS:
Use WASD for movements 
LMB for Attack 
RMB for Dash 
F for Interaction

KINAIYA GAMES:

Rheganne Kyle S. Atrido - Team Leader, Lead Programmer, and Level Designer 

Angelo C. Sacramento - Lead Concept Artist, Level Creator, Character Creator & Modeler, and Animator 

Alvin Matthew D. Borreta - Lead Game Designer, Lead UI Designer, Storyboard Creator, and Programmer 

Russell Krizzian O. Casalan - Lead Audio Designer, Lead Character & Level Designer, Art Director, Lead Animator, Concept Artist, and Programmer.

This is our first game together, any feedback would be deeply appreciated. :)
